name: Patagonia Black Hole Wheeled Duffle 40L - Unisex
description:
A rugged, carry-on sized rolling duffle that's equally at home sitting in hotel lobbies or strapped down in the fuselage of a bush plane. Patagonia's Black Hole fabric is extremely durable, highly water-resistant and made from 100% recycled materials. Multiple robust carry options let you roll, lift, throw or drag it as the situation demands.Made from burly 900-denier recycled polyester ripstop, coated with a TPU-film laminate and DWR-treated for water resistance.Lining is 200-denier recycled polyester with a polyurethane coating.U-shaped lid provides easy access to main compartment.Two internal mesh organizers keep small items separate.Internal compression straps keep contents in place.Zippered exterior pocket stores your boarding pass, a book or a snack.Frame design protects contents from rough handling, and keeps duffle upright even when fully loaded.Smooth-rolling oversized wheels.Two-position telescoping handle.Dual handles with snap closure for a duffle-style carry.Sturdy haul loops at each end.Corner-mounted daisy chains act as attachment points for extra gear or as tie-down points for strapping duffle to a roof rack.

        Sustainability
